resources.string: The session has not yet begun!!
Read the following instructions carefully. You will not be allowed to read the instructions once the session has begun.
1. Each question will have 4 options out of which only 1 is correct.
2. The marked option will turn green if the answer is right and red if the answer is incorrect.
3. You will have 8 secs to give the answer.
4. When the time is up, the question is marked as timed out and the next question is displayed.
5. You may skip a question in between if you wish to.
6. Once you feel you have solved enough questions, you can hit the stop quiz button which ends the session and presents a report and analysis of the session.
7. Your aim should be to increase the percentage of correct answers with more and more attempts
